bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of heat sores that appear as prickly heat in their early stages, then gradually change into blisters with liquid and acquire a red color resembling fire sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yun tai 芸薹 quoting Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29: 近效療火油及天火瘡，初 出似沸子，漸漸大如水泡，似火燒瘡赤色 , “The Jin xiao [states]: to heal fire oil [sores] and celestial fire sores. When they first appear they resemble bubbles of boiling water. They gradually grow larger until they resemble water blisters. They look like sores resulting from fire burns”, writes: 天火熱瘡：初起似痱， 漸如水泡，似火燒瘡，赤色，急速能殺人 , “ Celestial fire heat sores : When they first emerge they resemble a seething rash. Gradually they assume the appearance of water blisters. Their color is red, and they may quickly kill a person”.
